text: Joe Madison Jackson (March 14, 1923 - January 13, 2019) was a retired American soldier. He served as a career officer in the United States Air Force. He received the Medal of Honor during the Vietnam War for a dangerous rescue operation of three American military personnel. He was born in Newnan, Georgia. Jackson died on January 13, 2019 at his home in Washington state at the age of 95.Medal of Honor Recipient Joe M. title: Joe M. Jackson
